The faconnes de: Faconnes uses authentic data directly from the regions and cities. You can display brief information on the individual locations and events. With the route function you can display places and events along your route. With the location function you can explore places and events in your vicinity.
Information from three categories is pro: Information from three categories is provided:
LandscapeCulture1: Cultural and scenic highlights such as UNESCO world heritage sites, museums and excellent gardens.
LocalMarketsShops1: Local shops, large and small weekly and flea markets and selected wine cellars.
EventsLeisure1: Exhibitions, concerts, local events, parks for a picnic up to events for children.
Villages belonging to the association <1: Villages belonging to the association <1>Plus beaux villages de France.</1>

RemarkableGardens1: The label Remarkable Garden is issued by the French Ministry of Culture with the assistance of the Conseil national des parcs et jardins (the list presented here is not exhaustive).
<0>Grands Sites</0>: <0>Grands Sites The Grand Site de France label is awarded by the Ministry of Ecological and Solidarity Transition. It aims to promote the proper conservation and enhancement of natural sites classified as French sites of high notoriety and very high visitor numbers. The list of faconnes.de also presents the members of the network Grand Site de France who have not yet received the label.
<0>National Monuments</0>: <0>National Monuments</0>Building managed by the National Monuments Centre, which opens to visitors nearly 100 monuments owned by the State.
The data presented in the headings <1>Pa: The data presented in the headings <1>Parks and Gardens</1>, <3>Local trade</3>, <5>Craft workshop</5> as well as all the headings of the group <7>Agenda</7> (<9>Exhibitions, Music and Shows</9>, <11>Children's Corner</11>, <13>Markets</13>, and <15>Vide-greniers</15>) come from the DataTourism platform
Offline maps: Travellers to remote places often have a limited bandwidth, expensive roaming charges and unreliable connections. Faconnes' caching functionality allows them to prepare their destination before an excursion, the map data, information, and the use of the application will remain available during their trip.
